title: Dataset JDBC field metadata
description: The JDBC metadata for a field, coming from the original JDBC object

type.description: the JDBC type of the field, for instance varchar

size.description: the size for the field, for instance 10

scale.description: number of digits to the right of the numeric field

key.description: indicates if the field is part of the primary key

foreignKey.description: indicates if the field is a foreign key

unique.description: indicates if the field is unique
